name: Apple
description: Apples are an incredibly nutritious fruit that offers multiple health benefits. They're rich in fiber and antioxidants

name: Cherry
description: Cherries are classified as drupes, which are a subcategory of the fruit genus. Drupes, sometimes referred to as stone fruits

name: Mango
description: They are a great source of magnesium and potassium, both of which are connected to lower blood pressure and a regular pulse

name: Orange
description: They are a good source of vitamin C, as well as several other vitamins, minerals, and antioxidants.Protects your cells from damage

name: Graps
description: The nutrients in grapes may help protect against cancer, eye problems, cardiovascular disease, and other health conditions

name: Watermelon
description: Watermelon is rich in an amino acid called citrulline that may help move blood through your body and can lower your blood pressure
